item.title: What Teh Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:9, topic:375666”]Similar to jaruannas, but this wont give you any problems.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && (playerRights >= 1 || donator == 1)) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[MOD] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[ADMIN] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[CO-OWNER] "; } if (donator == 1) { titles = "[DONOR] "; } if (playerRights == 1 && donator == 1) { titles = "[MOD-DONOR] "; } if (playerRights == 2 && donator == 1) { titles = "[ADMIN-DONOR] "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Frostyboy07")) { titles = "[OWNER] "; } talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); } [/quote]

Thank you very much, I do know all of this, but apparently I had a moment of retarded-ness…

Lock please

Read full topic

item.title: What Teh Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

[quote=“4 2 0, post:10, topic:375666”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=471596.msg3449552#msg3449552 date=1293652361]
Similar to jaruannas, but this wont give you any problems.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && (playerRights >= 1 || donator == 1)) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[MOD] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[ADMIN] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[CO-OWNER] "; } if (donator == 1) { titles = "[DONOR] "; } if (playerRights == 1 && donator == 1) { titles = "[MOD-DONOR] "; } if (playerRights == 2 && donator == 1) { titles = "[ADMIN-DONOR] "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Frostyboy07")) { titles = "[OWNER] "; } talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }
[/quote]

Looks Good.[/quote]
Now just to help you LEARN a bit, && means and, and || means or. So if you put (playerRights >= 1 || donator == 1)) thats saying if it’s a player with 1 rights, or if it’s a donator it can use yell. ^^^ should work beautifully.

Read full topic

item.title: What Teh Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

[quote=“frostyboy07, post:1, topic:375666”]Okay, my ::yell command is fucking retarded.

I want to make it so that Moderators and higher can use it, as well as Donators ONLY.

So, I made it like this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1 && donator == 1) {
                String titles = "";
                if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles = "[MOD] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles = "[ADMIN] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                    titles = "[CO-OWNER] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 4) {
                    titles = "[Player] ";
                }
                if (donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[DONOR] ";
                }
		if (playerRights == 0) {
                    titles = "[Player] ";
                }
		if (playerRights == 1 && donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[MOD-DONOR] ";
                }
		if (playerRights == 2 && donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[ADMIN-DONOR] ";
                }
		if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Frostyboy07")) {
                    titles = "[OWNER] ";
                }
                talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                        + command.substring(5));
        }

However, donators can’t yell, LOL.

Help please? xD[/quote]

what you are saying in this command is that you have to be greater than or equal to a mod and you have to be a donator.

try:

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1 || donator == 1) {
String titles = “”;
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[MOD] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[ADMIN] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[CO-OWNER] ";
}
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = "[Player] ";
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = "[DONOR] ";
}
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = "[Player] ";
}
if (playerRights == 1 && donator == 1) {
titles = "[MOD-DONOR] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2 && donator == 1) {
titles = "[ADMIN-DONOR] ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Frostyboy07”)) {
titles = "[OWNER] ";
}
talk(titles + “” + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

reply if it doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: What Teh Fuck?
item.description:
@4_2_0 wrote:

You could just scrap the first line all together. I mean remove the playerRights and donator from that part of the IF method. Because you SAY you only want moderators and higher to be able to use it, but you still have a title for regular people.

Try removing the playerRights >= 1 && donator == 1) from the first part.

Read full topic

item.title: What Teh Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Your command requires players must have rights 1 or more AND be a donator to use yell. Anybody below player right 1 (whether they are donators or not) and any staff who is not a donator will not be able to yell…

Look at the first line of your command and try again

Read full topic

item.title: What Teh Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

Okay, my ::yell command is fucking retarded.

I want to make it so that Moderators and higher can use it, as well as Donators ONLY.

So, I made it like this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1 && donator == 1) {
                String titles = "";
                if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles = "[MOD] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles = "[ADMIN] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                    titles = "[CO-OWNER] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 4) {
                    titles = "[Player] ";
                }
                if (donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[DONOR] ";
                }
		if (playerRights == 0) {
                    titles = "[Player] ";
                }
		if (playerRights == 1 && donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[MOD-DONOR] ";
                }
		if (playerRights == 2 && donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[ADMIN-DONOR] ";
                }
		if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Frostyboy07")) {
                    titles = "[OWNER] ";
                }
                talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                        + command.substring(5));
        }

However, donators can’t yell, LOL.

Help please? xD

Read full topic
